popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

seo.pageTitle: Purchase Cryptocurrencies Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet
seo.pageDescription: Effortless Cryptocurrency Purchases and Swaps at Competitive Rates Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Onboard to crypto with MetaMask. Just click on the “Buy” button on the MetaMask browser extension or mobile app to get started. You can also connect your wallet to MetaMask Portfolio to get started.

The improved user experience shows you quotes based on your region, your preferred payment method, the token you want to buy, and the providers that are available to you.

With a funded MetaMask wallet, you’re ready to explore Web3 on your own terms.

node.headline: A convenient way to buy cryptocurrency

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our providers generally support credit and debit cards: Visa and Mastercard.
You can pay with Apple Pay, Google Pay, and PayPal (where available).
ACH transfer in the USA and SEPA in Europe.
Our providers also support a wide selection of alternative local payment methods.

modules.title: Competitive fiat to crypto exchange rates

image.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate

imageDarkMode.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate dark

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Each payment method has a different fee structure based on the region. Generally speaking, credit or debit transactions are more expensive with lower limits, while bank transfers have fewer fees and higher purchase limits.
A user can expect to pay a processing fee, a MetaMask fee and the market rate for gas.

Some users end up paying gas fees twice: once when they buy on a centralized exchange or elsewhere, and then again when depositing into MetaMask. Buying cryptocurrency on MetaMask eliminates this double cost, and additionally, the funds will be available immediately.

backgroundImage.title: The best way to buy cryptocurrency bg

node.headline: Transact securely with our payment providers
Own your crypto in a private and secure way

childMarkdownRemark.html: Any personal information you provide during the purchase is not shared with us: MetaMask doesn’t store or process payment details, personal data, email addresses, etc.

Unlike a centralized exchange, neither our partners nor MetaMask have access to the cryptocurrency after you purchase or transfer. As a result, users can immediately use their assets without a holding period.
MetaMask ensures that all providers comply with applicable regulations and that they are legitimate, responsible parties.

backgroundImage.title: Own your crypto in a private and safe way bg

childMarkdownRemark.html: You can buy stablecoins and native tokens from within MetaMask globally across a wide variety of networks: Ethereum, Polygon, Linea, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, Celo, Optimism, and Arbitrum among others.
Buy crypto how you want, when you want
You can buy cryptocurrency in an easy way through vetted partners.
You can buy cryptocurrency, generally with your preferred payment method, through easy and smooth partner integration.
You can expect favorable quotes from many of our providers with low fees and minimal shifts in exchange rates, regardless of how much crypto you buy.

node.headline: Download MetaMask and onboard to crypto
